price: But whoever observes patience and forgives, it is indeed a matter of great resolve[22].
arabic: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمِنۡ عَزۡمِ ٱلۡأُمُورِ
footnotes: [22] On the part of those seeking Allah’s reward; none can be guided to this except those whom Allah blessed with great merit.
